title: Surbhi Jyoti & Barun Sobti To Make This Valentines‚Äô Day Super Special!

persons.name: barun as haider ali khan  both barun

text:
¬ª Surbhi Jyoti & Barun Sobti To Make This Valentines‚Äô Day Super Special! Surbhi Jyoti & Barun Sobti To Make This Valentines‚Äô Day Super Special! Surbhi Jyoti and Barun Sobti have something special for their fans this Valentines‚Äô Day. Read on to know more‚Ä¶ Updated:   18:43   
Surbhi Jyoti and Barun Sobti 's web series Tanhaiyan is in news since a long time. The duo has a huge fan following, and they have been waiting desperately for this web series. A few promos of the web series were released which had kept the excitement in the audiences intact. The good news is the web series will go live on Hotstar on Valentines' day. It's a 'super' good news as the audiences need not wait for the next episode, as all the episodes will go live on same day!! Read on to know more about the latest trailer and watch the promo... Tanhaiyan New Trailer 
In the video, both Surbhi and Barun are attending friend's marriage. It seems like they were waiting for each other's call. Barun & Surbhi Waiting For Each Other‚Äôs Calls 
As soon as the phone rings, they jump to attend the call. By mistake, Barun drops his friend's phone who had asked him to take pictures, while Surbhi picks the bride's phone thinking it was hers! Barun As Haider Ali Khan 
Both Barun and Surbhi apologise to their friends. They are disappointed as it was not their phone! In the trailer, Barun and Surbhi looked wow in their traditional attire. Surbhi As Meera Kapoor 
At the end of the trailer, Barun will be seen telling, "Intezaar love ke liye acha hota hai," while Surbhi says, "Hamari love story ke sare episodes dekhne ke liye nahi." On The Set Fun 
Previously, Gul Khan had shared a video of Barun and Surbhi dancing crazily for Punjabi song. She wrote, "Some people remain the same with you from the first day they shoot with you till their stardom.... Sobti and Jyoti are one of those rare people....Here is the proof üòÇüòÇüòÇüòÇ." Another On The Set Picture 
Gul has been sharing videos and on the sets pictures. She shared another video and wrote, "Tanhayian Diaries 5...Some times when u just Walk The Fun!!!" Surbhi shared the trailer of the webseries on her social networking account and wrote, "This time Valentines Day is gonna be super special ‚ù§Ô∏è all the episodes of #tanhaiyan on this Valentine's Day ü§ó#Repost @hotstar with @repostapp „Éª„Éª„Éª Intezaar love ke liye achha hota hai ... #TanhiyanTrailer #TanhaiyanOnHotstar #HotstarOriginals #BarunSobti @surbhijyoti @gulenaghmakhan." A video posted by Surbhi Jyoti (@surbhijyoti) on Feb 1, 2017 at 9:51am PST The web series is produced by Gul Khan (4 Lions Films) and directed by Gorky M. Barun plays the role of Haider, while Surbhi will be seen playing the role of Meera Kapoor. Mohit Abrol will also be seen in the web series.In a video, Surbhi had also introduced the characters - Neelam will be seen playing the role of Tara - the happiest character in the show. Nisha Nagpal will be seen playing the role of Rashi, an adorable character. Aansh Arora will be seen portraying the role of Vishal, who is an organised person.
Hit the comment box and tell us how excited you are for this web series ....
